name: Avex Designs
tagline: Creative Digital Agency in New York City
description:
Avex is a boutique digital agency based in New York City. We partner with high-growth brands in fashion, beauty, luxury and lifestyle. We create stylish and usable digital solutions that are supported by cutting edge technology and aligned with specific business goals. 
Our core focus is on the design, build and optimization of Shopify & Shopify Plus websites, as well as developing creative content. 
Our team consists of experts in strategy, creative, user-experience, content, technology, and optimization. We take a “brand first” approach to the creative process by completley immersing ourselves in your brand and culture to become an extension of your team.
